full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE NAS RGYAL BA SRAS BCAS THAMS CAD LA PHUL BA'I SPRING YIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE NAS PHYOGS BCU'I RGYAL BA SRAS BCAS LA NYAM THAG PA'I TSUL GYIS GLU BLANGS PHUL BZHIN GSOL BA BTAB PAS, ,KHONG RNAMS KYIS MYUR BA MYUR BAR PHYOGS THAMS CAD 'PHEL PAR MDZAD PAS, ,RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHES SHIN TU DGA' STE RDZOGS LDAN BZHIN DU SLAR RGYAS PAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR SKYES PA'I PAn CHUNG MKHAS GRUB ZER BAS SKYE 'GRO'I SPYOD TSUL DANG BSTAN PA'I GNAS TSUL GYI NYAMS DANG SBYAR TE BRIS PA RANG NYID BYA ROG DKAR BOR GRUB STE 'DZAM GLING PA RNAMS DANG 'GRAS 'DOD PA MA YIN GYI SKAL MNYAM 'GA' ZHIG LA'ANG PHAN PA'I SKABS SRID DAM SNYAM PA YIN PAS KHYED 'GA' ZHIG GI THUGS LA PHOG TSE BZOD PA'I PHAN YON DRAN PAR ZHU ZHU, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON,, ,,)
